Errors.Self: @<SenderUser> You cant do that to yourself!
Errors.TooFast: @<SenderUser> You cant do that so quickly! Please wait @<Amount> @<OtherString>.
Errors.MissingParameters: @<SenderUser> you are missing parameters or have too many!
Errors.InvalidParameters: @<SenderUser> you have one or more invalid parameters!
Errors.NegativeValue: @<SenderUser> You have enetered a negative, please dont do that!

Duel.Start: @<TargetUser> @<SenderUser> Wants to duel you for @<Amount> @<CurrencyName>! Use @<Prefix>accept or @<Prefix>deny.
Duel.NotInDuel: @<SenderUser> You are not in a duel!

Request.Success: @<SenderUser> @<OtherString> Has been queued and is in position @<Amount>!

Songs.CurrentFailed: @<SenderUser> An Error Occured while fetching data! Please try again soon.

Notifications.Already: @<SenderUser> You already have stream notifications turned @<OtherString>!
Notifications.Set: @<SenderUser> Your stream notifications are now turned @<OtherString>!

Moderator.NightBotError: @<SenderUser> An error occured while performing the request!

Raffle.Start: /me PogChamp a Raffle has begun for @<Amount> Owlcoin PogChamp it will end in 60 Seconds. Enter by typing "!join" OpieOP
Raffle.45Sec: /me The Raffle for @<Amount> Owlcoin will end in 45 Seconds. Enter by typing "!join" FeelsGoodMan
Raffle.30Sec: /me The Raffle for @<Amount> Owlcoin will end in 30 Seconds. Enter by typing "!join" FeelsGoodMan
Raffle.15Sec: /me The Raffle for @<Amount> Owlcoin will end in 15 Seconds. Enter by typing "!join" FeelsGoodMan
Raffle.Win: The Raffle ended and @<TargetUser> won @<Amount> @<CurrencyName> FeelsGoodMan
Raffle.NoEntry: No one entered the raffle LUL

EventMessages.GiftedSub: @<SenderUser> Gifted a sub too @<TargetUser> and received @<Amount> Owlcoin!
EventMessages.Subbed: @<SenderUser> Subbed for the first time and received @<Amount> Owlcoin!

Messages.Text: Amazon prime allows you to subscribe to the Harbonator for FREE. 1. Click here and link your account: https://twitch.amazon.com/prime 2. Click the subscribe button and select your Amazon Prime as payment method. Its is that simple to support your favourite streamer :))))).
:pick: harbonT Don't mind me, just mining some Owlcoin :pick: harbonT
If you clip a good play or a stupid moment please post it in my discords #twitch_chat_and_clips channel.
Consider getting the BTTV and FrankerFaceZ plugins to be able to see extra emotes!
